294390.name: Escape The Lost Kingdom: The Forgotten Pharaoh
294390.description: A young family is invited to visit the newly opened museum in Egypt; while touring the museum they discover a long forgotten tomb of a cursed Pharaoh named Raned. After being separated you now have to play as each character. Help the family reunite, escape this long-lost Egyptian kingdom and discover the story behind the fascinating tomb and treasures that are buried within.
294390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
